chunk:
Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Store out of reach of children. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Allergy Suffers Test Before Use.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
